assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Vitzrosys. Co., Ltd engages in the IT convergence and integration, renewable energy, U-city, and wireless communication businesses in Korea and internationally. Its IT convergence and integration business products include electric grid, digital substation automation, substation diagnosis and preventive, and supervisory control and data acquisition systems; gas supplying facility monitoring and duct line control systems; and integrated railway monitoring, train information providing, platform safety door, and regenerative inverter systems. The company also offers traffic management, bus information management, and image application systems; and environment plant products, such as integrated operating and managing, process control, process diagnosis, and pipe network and conduit monitoring systems. In addition, it provides instrumentation and control, and electric equipment for nuclear plants; and small hydro power systems. Further, the company offers system development and maintenance, system consulting, system integration, software development, and IT outsourcing services on mobile and wireless communication, as well as various value added services for railway and facility fields. Vitzrosys. Co., Ltd was founded in 1989 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
